survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate training programs to identify strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of the training programs to your job role?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of the training programs to your job role?

questions.question_text: Which of the following training topics have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: Which of the following training topics have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has the training improved your job performance? (Please provide specific examples)
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: How has the training improved your job performance? (Please provide specific examples)

questions.question_text: What additional training topics would you like to see offered in the future?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify unmet training needs.

script.question_text: What additional training topics would you like to see offered in the future?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of the training materials?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure question clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of the training materials?
